name: Operation Smile
tagline: Operation Smile is a world-wide organization that provides patients, with cleft conditions and facial deformities, access to safe and comprehensive surgical care.
description: Operation Smile is a world-wide organization that provides patients, with cleft conditions and facial deformities, access to safe and comprehensive surgical care. During the academic year, our ANS club will work collaboratively to raise funds and awareness for this cause, through fundraisers and student-led projects. Members will also have opportunities to participate in medical missions, surgical programs and international conferences. We highly recommend this club to students who are interested in the medical field, however, all students from all years groups are welcome to join!

name: School Show
tagline: The School Show is a large scale performing arts production that brings together students from drama, music, and dance to create a full theatrical performance.
description: The School Show is a large scale performing arts production that brings together students from drama, music, and dance to create a full theatrical performance. Students collaborate through rehearsals, mini-show sharings, and performances to develop skills in acting, singing, dancing, technical theatre, and ensemble work. The club promotes teamwork, creativity, confidence, and commitment, culminating in a fully staged production performed to a live audience.
meetingTime: 3:45-5:45 Additional longer rehearsals are usually scheduled on Sundays, typically 11:00am–4:00pm
contact: LINE group for cast and crew led by student directors
specialConditions:
Participation is by audition or application, depending on role.

Cast and dancers audition - week 3 of term 1.1

Student directors and technical team members apply via Google Form and interview
Students are expected to demonstrate commitment, good attendance, and the ability to work collaboratively.
Additional rehearsals are compulsory during the rehearsal and performance period.

name: MUN
tagline: Model United Nations is a club that allows students to role play as delegates from different countries or as a historical person to debate global issues.
description: Model United Nations is a club that allows students to role play as delegates from different countries or as a historical person to debate global issues. This club allows for a stimulation of how an actual conference would proceed in the United Nations. Participants are able to develop public speaking, research, and negotiation skills, as well as collaborate with other delegates within the same stance, building connections.

name: SPARK Club
tagline: The SPARK club aims to promote acts of kindness through offering experiences to those who may be less fortunate while also ensuring our students get hands-on activities based on their preferred interests and having a chance to step up and lead the projects.
description: The SPARK club aims to promote acts of kindness through offering experiences to those who may be less fortunate while also ensuring our students get hands-on activities based on their preferred interests and having a chance to step up and lead the projects.
contact:
Line: https://line.me/ti/g/cVqj3SKKLd
Instagram: @spark.ans (for contacting the leaders)
applicationQuestionsRaw: Name, Year group, old member/new member, why do you want to join SPARK club/your expectations of the club, field of interests (open to any whether its sports, arts, media, science, pr etc. Feel free to share!)

name: Interact Club
tagline: The Interact Club is a non-profit organisation which focuses on voluntary service and making contributions to the society in order to promote responsibility, leadership, and understanding between individuals.
description: The Interact Club is a non-profit organisation which focuses on voluntary service and making contributions to the society in order to promote responsibility, leadership, and understanding between individuals. At Interact Club, we work under the motto “Service above self”, which is prioritising the lives of those who are struggling over ourselves, ensuring that they live a happy and healthy life.
contact: Line group invitation after first meeting
applicationQuestionsRaw: Name, Year, why do they want to join the Interact Club, which roles (eg. Finance, events, social media) would they like to be a part of?

name: Eco Commitee
tagline: The Eco Committee is a club which aims to raise environmental awareness on the importance of climate change, sustainability and what we can do together as a school.
description: The Eco Committee is a club which aims to raise environmental awareness on the importance of climate change, sustainability and what we can do together as a school. By participating in the Eco Committee, members will get the chance to take part in many roles and help us design the “Eco Fashion Show” - our annual big event. As a member of TASS (The Alliance of Sustainable Schools), we strive to do the best for ANS under the vision “one small contribution from everyone, leads to a greener environment and an impactful difference to the whole community.
contact: Members will be invited to line group
applicationQuestionsRaw: - Name, Year group, why do they want to join the eco committee, how will joining this club affect them as an individual?

name: Duke of Edinburgh
tagline: The Duke of Edinburgh’s International Award (DofE) Club supports students in developing life skills through a balanced programme of Volunteering, Physical Recreation, Skills, and an Adventurous Journey.
description: The Duke of Edinburgh’s International Award (DofE) Club supports students in developing life skills through a balanced programme of Volunteering, Physical Recreation, Skills, and an Adventurous Journey. The Award encourages independence, resilience, teamwork, and personal growth, helping students build confidence and prepare for future academic and life challenges.
applicationQuestionsRaw:
Which Award level are you applying for (Bronze / Silver / Gold)?

Date of birth (to confirm age eligibility)

Why do you want to join the DofE International Award?

Have you previously completed any level of the DofE Award? (If yes, please specify)

Are you willing to commit time weekly to Volunteering, Physical, and Skills sections?

Do you have any medical conditions or considerations we should be aware of?

name: UNICEF Ambassador
tagline: UNICEF is a club committed to helping struggling children (e.
description: UNICEF is a club committed to helping struggling children (e.g., children with disabilities, children in need of financial assistance, or children impacted by natural or political events)  and ensuring their rights, whether through direct assistance or fundraising for the donation or sponsorship of children.
applicationQuestionsRaw: Name, Year Group, House, Which group they want to join within UNICEF (Event team and Graphics design team)

name: TEDX
tagline: TEDx Club is a safe and inclusive space for students to share ideas, perspectives, and stories that matter.
description: TEDx Club is a safe and inclusive space for students to share ideas, perspectives, and stories that matter. We believe that even small ideas can spark meaningful change. The club welcomes diversity, encourages respectful listening, and empowers members to think boldly, speak confidently, and spread ideas worth sharing.
applicationQuestionsRaw:
Choose one TEDx Amnuay Silpa School Youth talk to watch and describe what you learned from the talk.
Interests, passions, and abilities(youtube link: https://www.youtube.com/live/Zr9k0QWJl-U?si=eHxhG2GiFHkn7hGd)
